short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows to share your entire screen or a specific window in Skyroom application. It also provides tab recording.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Skyroom is a web conferencing system that can be used for creating online events like learning, meeting and webinar. Skyroom provides the following key features:

- Real-time voice and video conversations
- Presentation
- Whiteboard
- Screen Sharing
- File Transfer
- Advanced Chat
- Recording
